name: Personal projects from Péter Trombitás
body:
# WebGL
Some WebGL projects I created at university.
Please be noted: they make heavy use of the GPU. They're not optimized for mobile. You have been warned :)

### [Ray-casting brain visualization demo](webgl-ray-casting/brain.html)
[Source code](https://github.com/trombipeti/trombipeti.github.io/tree/master/webgl-ray-casting)
![Opacity rendering brain visualization in action](webgl-ray-casting/opacity-rendering.png)
### [Path tracer demo](webgl-path-tracing/trace.html)
[Source code](https://github.com/trombipeti/trombipeti.github.io/tree/master/webgl-path-tracing)
![Path tracing in action](webgl-path-tracing/path-tracing.png)

# C++
### [SDL/OpenGL function drawer with RPN parser, written in C++11](https://github.com/trombipeti/cpp11/tree/master/NHF2/SDLFuncDrawer)
University subject homework.
![Function drawer in action](images/func-drawer.png)
### [Object recignition with OpenCV](https://github.com/trombipeti/Onlab/tree/master/ObjDetect)
Part of the code I wrote for my BSc thesis.

# Java
### [Rubik's Cube timer](https://github.com/trombipeti/jrubixtimer/tree/master/src/jrubixtimer)
University subject homework.

# Assembly
### [Light show for a custom ATMEGA128-based panel](https://github.com/trombipeti/asm)
![Light show in action on a simulator](images/asm-light-show-simulator.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
